DOC.brief_title: A Pilot Study Evaluate Revised Method Assessing Food Commercial Weight Management Program Format
DOC.criteria: Male female 2565 year age inclusive Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 27.0 35.0 inclusive . Not currently take prescription medication weight loss ( e.g . orlistat ( Xenical ) , sibutramine ( Meridia ) , phentermine ) . Not currently take overthecounter weight loss medication supplement ( ) . Not currently enrol commercial weight loss program ( e.g . Jenny Craig , Weight Watchers ) selfhelp group ( e.g . TOPS , Overeaters Anonymous ) . Willing able commit regular physical activity ( e.g . walk ) five day per week require study protocol . Willing keep turn daily log/compliance book time require study protocol . Willingness ability make schedule appointment MUSC require study protocol . Willingness make weekly meeting MUSC . History thyroid disease , take medication , medication dosage change one time last 6 month . History thyroid disease stable dose prescription medication 6 month longer acceptable . Diagnosed Type I Type II diabetes glucose intolerance , use antidiabetic medication History surgical procedure weight loss time ( e.g . gastroplasty , gastric bypass , gastrectomy partial gastrectomy , adjustable banding , gastric sleeve ) . History major surgery within three month enrollment . History heart problem ( e.g . angina , bypass surgery , MI , etc . ) within three month prior enrollment . Presence implant cardiac defibrillator pacemaker . Uncontrolled hypertension/high blood pressure . Orthopedic limitation would interfere ability engage regular physical activity . Gastrointestinal disorder include chronic malabsorptive condition , peptic ulcer disease , Crohn 's disease , chronic diarrhea active gallbladder disease . History presence cancer . Persons successfully resect basal cell carcinoma skin may enrol treatment complete 6 month prior enrollment . History clinically diagnose eat disorder include anorexia nervosa bulimia nervosa . Women pregnant , lactating , try become pregnant unwilling use effective mean birth control . Participation another clinical trial within 30 day prior enrollment . Weight loss 5 pound reason 30 day prior enrollment . Taking psychotropic medicine know influence weight weight loss
